Your Page Title Here

This is your sample pop-up page that is included in the download. To edit the size of the popup, open the "pop-up.js" in Notepad or a plain text editor. Edit "var popup_width" and "var popup_height". You can also turn on any option by replacing the "0" with a "1". Example: change "toolbar=0" to "toolbar=1" to have a toolbar in the pop-up.

Edit the "pop-upstyle.css" file to change the colors for this text and the page title.
